package.name: Net_Socket
package.description: Net_Socket is a class interface to TCP sockets. It provides blocking and non-blocking operation, with different reading and writing modes (byte-wise, block-wise, line-wise and special formats like network byte-order ip addresses).
package.notes: QA release - Configurable newline sequence (PEAR Bug #14181) - Make $size parameter to gets() optional (PEAR Bug #14433) - Don't overwrite $errstr set by fsockopen (PEAR Bug #14448) - Avoid an infinite loop if fwrite() returns 0 (PEAR Bug #14619) - CS cleanup (PEAR Bug #14803)
